title: PURAMENTO Small Selenite Skyscraper Tower - Healing Charging Crystal for Energy and Chakra Balance, Reiki, Meditation, Metaphysical, Witchcraft (4 Inch / 10cm Tower) (2)
features: Cleansing and Inspiration for Your Mind, Body & Spirit - This solid, white selenite crystal tower offers powerful energy cleansing and protection for your environment, and powerful protective energy shielding if four towers are placed as a grid in corners of a room. Charge selenite crystals with sunlight and clean with salt–do not place in water as the crystal is water soluble.

A Versatile Gift - Our premium, Moroccan selenite crystal towers are the perfect mother’s day gift, valentine’s day gift, birthday gift, and are also perfect for client gifts, party favors, wedding favors, event favors, or part of a handmade gift basket or gift set.

Cut For Clarity - Each selenite skyscraper is hand-cut by a local artisan to maximize and direct energy flow to assist with meditation, energy balance, reiki, metaphysical, and wicca practice. Each tower can be placed throughout your home to beautifully reflect light across your environment.

Ethically Sourced - Our selenite is sourced directly from the mine, and we have partnered with a mining co-op focused on leaving the smallest possible ecological footprint, and paying fair wages to the miners and craftsmen. As we purchase direct, less fuel and handling costs are associated with our selenite, which means our selenite is both an exceptional value and better for the environment.

Our Promise To You - As selenite is a natural product, there will be slight variations in size and shape of the product. Our promise to you is that you love the product you receive. If for any reason the product has arrived with damage or simply not to your expectation, we will stop at nothing to make it right, and stand behind our PURAMENTO product guarantee.
